thread.section_title: New York Marriott East Side - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Nice staff, OK NYC room
thread.title_full: Nice staff, OK NYC room - Review of New York Marriott East Side, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: mankerholz
title: Nice staff, OK NYC room
text:
We were in part of the hotel that wasn't redone and you could tell it was due for updates, but the room was large by NYC standards and adequate. The bed was very soft.
It was nice that the club lounge had water, tea, and other beverages and light snacks available, and the gym on the top floor was just what you need for a quick trip.
